thread.title: Listen to Parquet Courts and Bun B’s New Song
thread.title_full: Listen to Parquet Courts and Bun B’s New Song

author: Michelle Kim
title: Listen to Parquet Courts and Bun B’s New Song
text:
Open share drawer Listen to Parquet Courts and Bun B’s New Song Watch the lyric video for the “Captive of the Sun” remix and check out Austin Brown’s Houston rap playlist Bun B photo by Tom Szczerbowski/Getty Images for New Era Cap Co. 
Parquet Courts and Bun B have released a new collaborative single via Rough Trade. Side A of the 12” features a remix of the track “Captive of the Sun” from Parquet Courts’ 2016 album Human Performance . The remix, which was debuted during a performance on “ Colbert ,” also comes with a lyric video illustrated by Parquet Courts’ Andrew Savage. The B-side of the 12” features a “ Chopped Not Slopped ” remix from Houston producers DJ Candlestick and OG Ron C. In honor of the collaboration, Parquet Courts’ Austin Brown, under the name Young Doc Gooden, has curated a Houston rap playlist including tracks from UGK —listen below. 
Check out our Icebreaker interview with Parquet Courts. 

Listen to Austin Brown’s Houston rap playlist:
